Welcome to CDSIG-Schema’s documentation!¶

Study information¶

Information about the study

https://github.com/cdsig/CDSIG-Schema/blob/main/study.json

type

object

properties

  • name

Study name.

type

string

  • uuid

MD5 hash generated from the name field.

type

string

  • prereg_doi

DOI (Digital Object Identifier) of pre-registration document describing data collection.

type

string

  • clinical_trial

Is this a registered clinical trial?

type

boolean

  • description

Short description of the study.

type

string

  • sample

Short description of the study sample.

type

string

  • sample_groups

Description of the sample group(s).

type

object

properties

  • name

Name of group.

type

string

  • description

Description of sample group.

type

string

  • label

Label of sample group.

type

integer

  • group_size

Group size.

type

integer

minimum

1

  • inclusion_criteria

Inclusion criteria for sample group.

type

array

items

type

string

minItems

0

  • exclusion_criteria

Exclusion criteria for sample group.

type

array

items

type

string

minItems

0

  • intervention

Short description of the study intervention, if any.

type

string

  • keywords

Key words describing the study.

type

array

items

type

string

minItems

3

  • contributors

#/definitions/person

if

properties

  • clinical_trial

const

True

then

properties

  • clinical_trial_id

Clinical trial identifier.

type

string

definitions

  • person

type

object

properties

  • name

type

string

  • role

Role ID according to the Contributor Role Ontology (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/cro)

type

string

pattern

^((CRO_[0-9]{7})|(CREDIT_[0-9]{8}))$

  • email

type

string

format

idn-email

  • orcid

ORCID identifier

type

string

pattern

^[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{4}$

  • institution

type

object

properties

  • name

type

string

  • street_address

type

string

  • city

type

string

  • country

type

string

Dataset information¶

Information about the dataset

https://github.com/cdsig/CDSIG-Schema/blob/main/dataset.json

type

object

properties

  • name

Dataset name.

type

string

  • uuid

MD5 hash generated from the name field.

type

string

  • license

License of the dataset.

type

string

  • doi

DOI (Digital Object Identifier) of dataset.

type

string

  • linked_doi

DOI (Digital Object Identifier) of associated objects.

type

array

items

type

string

minItems

1

  • description

Short description of the dataset.

type

string

  • instructions

Description of the instructions that were given to the study participants prior to or during this data set.

type

object

properties

  • verbatim_instruction

Verbatim instructions given to participant.

type

string

  • wear_time

Number of days the participants were instructed to wear the actigraph. Fractional values are allowed.

type

number

minimum

0

  • contributors

#/definitions/person

  • data_set

Information about the data set effort.

type

object

properties

  • period

Time period during which the data collection has been performed.

type

object

properties

  • start_date_time

Start date-time for the data collection.

type

string

format

date-time

  • ongoing

Indicate if the data collection is still ongoing.

type

boolean

if

properties

  • ongoing

const

True

then

properties

  • stop_date_time

Stop date-time for the data collection.

type

string

format

date-time

if

properties

  • clinical_trial

const

True

then

properties

  • clinical_trial_id

Clinical trial identifier.

type

string

definitions

  • person

type

object

properties

  • name

type

string

  • role

Role ID according to the Contributor Role Ontology (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/cro)

type

string

pattern

^((CRO_[0-9]{7})|(CREDIT_[0-9]{8}))$

  • email

type

string

format

idn-email

  • orcid

ORCID identifier

type

string

pattern

^[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{4}$

Event¶

Event definition in the context of actigraphy

https://github.com/cdsig/CDSIG-Schema/blob/main/event.json

type

object

properties

  • event_id

The unique identifier for an event

type

number

multipleOf

1

minimum

0

  • event_name

Name of the event

type

string

  • start_date_time

Start date-time for an event

type

string

format

date-time

  • stop_date_time

Stop date-time for an event

type

string

format

date-time

  • comment

Comment about an event

type

string
